001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.function.Supplier;
007
008import javax.annotation.Nullable;
009
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
011import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.TokenSupplier;
012
013@Deprecated
014public class ClientFactory {
015
016    public static final String COMMERCETOOLS = "commercetools";
017
018    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
019            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
020        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier,
021            (request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic), new ArrayList<>(), null);
022    }
023
024    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
025            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
026        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier,
027            (request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic), userAgentSupplier,
028            new ArrayList<>(), null);
029    }
030
031    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
032            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
033        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier,
034            (request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic), middlewares, null);
035    }
036
037    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
038            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier,
039            final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
040        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier,
041            (request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic), userAgentSupplier, middlewares,
042            null);
043    }
044
045    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
046            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final List<Middleware> middlewares,
047            final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
048        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier,
049            (request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic), middlewares,
050            correlationIdProvider);
051    }
052
053    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
054            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier,
055            final List<Middleware> middlewares, final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
056        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier,
057            (request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic), userAgentSupplier, middlewares,
058            correlationIdProvider);
059    }
060
061    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
062            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
063            List<Middleware> middlewares) {
064        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier, internalLoggerFactory, middlewares, null);
065    }
066
067    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
068            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
069            final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier, List<Middleware> middlewares) {
070        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier, internalLoggerFactory, userAgentSupplier, middlewares,
071            null);
072    }
073
074    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
075            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
076            List<Middleware> middlewares, @Nullable final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
077        return create(apiBaseUrl, httpClient, tokenSupplier, internalLoggerFactory,
078            ClientBuilder::buildDefaultUserAgent, middlewares, correlationIdProvider);
079    }
080
081    public static ApiHttpClient create(final String apiBaseUrl, final VrapHttpClient httpClient,
082            final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier, final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
083            final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier, List<Middleware> middlewares,
084            @Nullable final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
085        return ClientBuilder.of(httpClient)
086                .defaultClient(apiBaseUrl)
087                .withInternalLoggerFactory(internalLoggerFactory)
088                .withUserAgentSupplier(userAgentSupplier)
089                .withTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier)
090                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
091                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
092                .build();
093    }
094}
